fullName.jp: アーシェ・バナルガン・ダルマスカ

description.jp:
強い意思と正義感を持つ誇り高き王女。
祖国ダルマスカ王国を侵略した
アルケイディア帝国への復讐に燃え 
強大な「力」を求めて奔走していたが 
ヴァンたち仲間との旅を通して 
過去と向き合うことの意味を知り 
自由を手にすべく 過去を断ち切った。
description.gl: A proud princess with an iron will and a profound desire for justice. Once bent on taking vengeance upon the Archadian Empire、 she sets out in pursuit of a great power、 but has a change of heart during her travels with Vaan and Balthier when she learns what it means to confront the past and be free of its shackles.

jp.text: 私に力を貸してください！
私はやらなきゃいけないのよ！\n死んでいった者たちのためにも！
過去を断ち切れば 自由……
力があっても過去は変わらない\n だからもう……
私はただ 自由でありたいだけ

gl.text: This is something that I have to do! For myself and all those who have fallen.
It's hard to leave the past behind. I know.
Even with power、 we cannot change what has passed. What is done、 is done.
And I want only to be free.

8-HIT Thunder Holy AoE magic BRV attack + AoE HP attack (80x8)
Increases BRV damage dealt by 60% when attacking single target
Stolen BRV can overflow up to 150% MAX BRV
Deals Full HP damage to all targets

Self: 3 turns [Noble Oath] 

[HP Attack] variants become [HP Attack (Queen's Order)] after use
• 5-HIT melee BRV attack + HP attack (60x5)
• Stolen BRV can overflow up to 150% MAX BRV
• Deals 50% HP damage to non-targets
• Moves all allies to next in turn order
• Party: fills EX gauge to MAX
• Allies: 1 turn [Queen's Order]
• Cannot initate [Chase]

While [Noble Oath] is active
• Increases HP damage dealt by 20%
• Target: 4 turns [Thunder & Holy Resist Down] after attacks

[Queen's Order]
• Increases BRV damage dealt, Stolen BRV overflow limit, HP damage dealt by 30%
* Cannot be extended
